summary:
Mercedes-Benz, often called Mercedes, is a famous German car brand known for luxury and commercial vehicles. It was started in 1926 and is based in Stuttgart, Germany. The company makes fancy cars and small trucks, all with the Mercedes-Benz name. They also used to make big trucks and buses, but now a different company, Daimler Truck, handles that.

Mercedes-Benz is super popular and sold the most high-end cars in the world in 2018. The brand's history goes way back to the first-ever car made by Carl Benz in 1886. Their slogan is "The Best or Nothing."
title: Mercedes-Benz
